forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 64F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 17C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy and windy at times. High 13C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. Windy with a mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
